game.title: The Lost Sword of Justice
game.objective: Retrive the legendary sword from the ancient ruins.
game.description: A powerful sword has been lost for centuries, and its retrieval is crucial to restoring balance to the land. The sword is hidden within an ancient ruin, guarded by treacherous traps and puzzles.

task.description: The ancient ruin lies hidden within a dense jungle. Navigate through the treacherous terrain to reach the entrance.
task.location: Jungle of Shadows, near the river

task.description: A series of pressure plates must be triggered in a specific order to unlock the next chamber. Observe the intricate carvings on the walls for clues.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the sword
task.description: A fearsome creature guards the sword. Defeat it using a combination of stealth and combat skills.
task.location: Inner sanctum of the ancient ruin
